title: Cant get hextech keys or chests
body: I had my chat banned 2 months ago and I have done trash talking like I used too.The thing is that even thought I got rid of the chat ban I am still unaible to get rewards like keys or chests even thought I completed the games required to get rid of the chat ban 2 or 3 weeks ago.Please inform me if there is a problem or if it is normal that I cant get rewards after getting rid of the ban that long ago.

replies.body: Completing the required games is just the first step, but the account also needs to show improved behavior constantly to restore eligibility for mastery chests.  More information on this is available at our [hextech restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) guide.  If you have any concerns, feel free to reach out to[ player behavior boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation)community.  Good luck!
